name: Notes from the Cape, Season 2
description:
Notes from the Cape, Season 2

Notes from the Cape is a visual novella series about the citizens of Cape Bottom Sail, a beach town and tourist destination on a peaceful, idyllic version of Earth. Episodes vary from slice of life, to cute and horny, to sincere and sweet. Expect some adult situations, nudity, and sex. This is an adults only series.

This package contains episodes 13-25 of Notes from the Cape.  It also contains image packs for every episode.

Created & Illustrated by Artdecade Written by Gerrark & Artdecade Coding by Super Deluxe Joe & Artdecade

For more episodes check out Season 1, here: https://artdecade.itch.io/notesseason1
Season 3 coming soon!

For more Willy Bear stuff, check out the Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/WillyBearBeach
